# popup popup弹出层

### 引入

``` javascript

```

## 代码演示

### 基础用法

默认中间弹出

 
``` html
<template>
    <div>
        <div class="btn__wrap">
            <div
                class="button"
                @click="onBtn"
            >
                点击弹出
            </div>
        </div>
        <example
            v-model="value"
            :fixed="true"
            @close="close"
        >
            <div class="section">
                内容
            </div>
        </example>
    </div>
</template>

<script>
    import example from '../../../src/index.vue';
    export default {
        name: 'Demo0',
        components: {
            example,
        },
        data() {
            return {
                value: false,
                position: 'center',
            };
        },
        methods: {
            onBtn() {
                this.value = true;
            },
            close() {
                this.value = false;
            },
        },
    };
</script>
<style lang="postcss" scoped>
.btn__wrap {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
}

.button {
    height: 70px;
    line-height: 70px;
    background: rgb(235, 9, 9);
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 28px;
    text-align: center;
    border-radius: 10px;
    padding: 0 16px;
}

.section {
    width: 600px;
    height: 600px;
    background: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: 40px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
}
</style>

```
### 弹出位置选择

可以设置为top、bottom、left、right

 
``` html
<template>
    <div>
        <div class="btn__wrap">
            <div
                class="button"
                @click="onBtn(0)"
            >
                底部弹出
            </div>
            <div
                class="button"
                @click="onBtn(1)"
            >
                顶部弹出
            </div>
            <div
                class="button"
                @click="onBtn(2)"
            >
                左侧弹出
            </div>
            <div
                class="button"
                @click="onBtn(3)"
            >
                右侧弹出
            </div>
        </div>
        <example
            v-model="value"
            :position="position"
            @close="close"
        >
            <div class="section">
                内容
            </div>
        </example>
    </div>
</template>

<script>
    import example from '../../../src/index.vue';
    export default {
        name: 'Demo1',
        components: {
            example,
        },
        data() {
            return {
                value: false,
                position: 'center',
            };
        },
        methods: {
            onBtn(num) {
                this.position = num === 0 ? 'bottom' : num === 1 ? 'top' : num === 2 ? 'left' : 'right';
                this.value = true;
            },
            close() {
                this.value = false;
            },
        },
    };
</script>
<style lang="postcss" scoped>
.btn__wrap {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-around;
}

.button {
    height: 70px;
    line-height: 70px;
    background: rgb(235, 9, 9);
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 28px;
    text-align: center;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-radius: 10px;
    padding: 0 16px;
}

.section {
    width: 100%;
    height: 600px;
    background: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: 40px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
}
</style>

```
